snippet.title: Aground Trailer
snippet.description:
This is the new trailer for the indie game Aground. 

One of the last human survivors, you find yourself stranded on an uninhabited island. With a few other victims of the crash, can you craft, mine, and build your way to survival?

Aground is an action/adventure 2d pixel RPG based on the theme of Progression.

Video created by M. Joshua and scored by Chase Bethea.

You can visit the game's homepage here: http://fancyfishgames.com/Aground/

You can purchase the game on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/876650/Aground/
